Name: DNSExfiltrator
Description: DNSExfiltrator allows for the exfiltration of data through DNS requests.
HTU: Install DNSExfiltrator, configure the DNS server, and use the tool to exfiltrate data via DNS.

Name: PowerShell Empire
Description: PowerShell Empire is a post-exploitation framework that includes modules for data exfiltration.
HTU: Install Empire, run the PowerShell agent on the target, and use exfiltration modules to extract data.

Name: Covenant
Description: Covenant is a collaborative .NET C2 framework that supports data exfiltration operations.
HTU: Install Covenant, deploy the agent on the target, and use the exfiltration modules to extract data.

Name: dnscat2
Description: dnscat2 is a tool designed to create an encrypted communication channel over the DNS protocol, suitable for data exfiltration.
HTU: Install dnscat2, configure the server and client, and use it to exfiltrate data over DNS.

Name: PoshC2
Description: PoshC2 is a proxy-aware C2 framework that supports data exfiltration among other post-exploitation tasks.
HTU: Install PoshC2, configure and deploy the agent, and use the framework to exfiltrate data.
